whoa!!!
Posted on Mar 26, 2002

hey. wtf.
whoa. whoa. omigod. whoa. So I guess dylan is getting married. that is nice. I thought that would come soon. as jn put it:
evil706 (11:50:11 PM): well I geuss dylan’s getting hitched before you or i
yep. The funny thing is, is that he told my parents via email and I found out via weblog. hehe. what is our world coming too. the internet is totally out of control. we need to stop it, before it gets out of hand..


Well congrats bro. I hope the best for the two you.
